body: Hi Mostapha! Thank you for your replay. Yes, I know. I edited the .epw. The simulation was worked successfully. But, I would like to run the simulation without .epw file because radiance only need latitude/longitude，time and direct / diffuse radiation to make sky file. Do you have plan to make the component working like this? I have one more question. I run simulation and got .HDR file. But, when it comes to convert this .HDR  to .tiff file with "adjustExposure" option, I got problem like attached file. Do you know how to solve it?  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zQ2pP5BJqrXiuO2-XahAefhNnUw9pWOFcOO7fXxvqrlr54bwpLaQMgz*KuHjYLcHR81vPKbzAiJsXQ4yQRVFYILBX0A0ujHL/1.JPG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zQ2pP5BJqrWs61emYmisY6k7oSWlCxNVAozxaYbRmRAIAQd5JRPf4auDPvaFoSz4BnNZuBJabFqPCDwWS9xCKz42SFPTtReo/2.JPG)
